casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Archimede N. NKIAM. No. 385PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 29, 2016. Daniel M. Blau, Raleigh, for Nkiam, Archimede N. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert H. Hale, Jr., Raleigh, for Nkiam, Archimede N. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of March 2016 by Defendant: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of March 2016." Defendant shall have up to and including the 6th of April 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. ERVIN, J. recused.
